title: Number of Starwood Hotels and Resorts hotels worldwide 2009 to 2015
summary: This statistic shows the Number of Starwood Hotels hotels from 2009 to 2015 .
There were 1161 Starwood Hotels hotels as of 1 , 2014 up from 1121 at the same time the previous Year .
gold: This statistic shows the number of Starwood Hotels and Resorts hotels worldwide from 2009 to 2015.
There were 1,161 Starwood Hotels and Resorts properties worldwide as of January 1 , 2014 , up from 1,121 in 2013 .
